| HistoryText             = A terrorist organization based in [[Africa]], they were known to hate anyone not belonging to the organization. They made a deal with [[Andreas Vadas (Earth-616)|Andreas Vadas]], a treacherous agent of the mercenary [[Wild Pack (Earth-616)|Wild Pack]], to obtain a hypnotic serum which would allow them to create "sleeper" agents which would become assassins by hearing a trigger phrase, along with six "sleepers" already distributed through the world. 

They tried to close the deal at [[Castle Doom (Upstate New York)|Dr. Doom's American castle]] but they had been tracked by [[Silvija Sablinova (Earth-616)|Silver Sable]], leader of the Wild Pack, and her new partner [[Dominic Fortune III (Earth-616)|Dominic Fortune]], P.I. They started a shootout which ended in most of the Sword of Glory members dead, including leader Mr. [[Albasini (Earth-616)|Albasini]], and Fortune being declared a hero. Vadas escaped,{{r|Sable and Fortune Vol 1 3}} but five of the six assassins were stopped on time.{{r|Sable and Fortune Vol 1 4}}
